Dialogue: You have an appointment?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: I'm an old friend. I just wanted to...

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: All visitors are required to make a reser--

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Weren't you just in the news? Some show in Prayge... Prague?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: E, I just need a patch job.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Must have happened a long time ago.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: What do you mean? You designed it.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: A new suit? Where the heck am I gonna get a new suit?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Wait. You want to make me a suit?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Yeah, something classic, like Dynaguy! Oh! He had a great look! Oh, the cape and the boots...

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Isn't that my decision?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Listen, E...

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Thunderhead was not the brightest bulb...

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: E, you can't generalize about these things.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: You know I'm retired from hero work.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: E, I only need a patch job. For sentimental reasons.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: You're the best of the best, E.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: I got it, I got it! Don't answer it, honey, I got it!

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: We have a new assignment for you. How soon can you get here?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: I'll leave tomorrow morning.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: See you there.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Goodbye.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Who was that, honey? The, uh, office?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Another conference. Short notice, but you know...duty calls. [nervous laugh]

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Bob?

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Yeah, what's up, honey?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Ha... have a great trip.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Thanks, sweetie. I'll call you when I get there.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: I love you. So much.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: I love you too.

Speaker: computer
Dialogue: This is your automated Captain. Would you care for more mimosa?

Speaker: computer
Dialogue: You're welcome.

Speaker: computer
Dialogue: Currently 78 degrees in Nomanisan. Perfect weather for flying.

Speaker: computer
Dialogue: Please fasten your seat belt. We're beginning our descent.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: Hello, Mr. lncredible. Nice suit.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: You'll be briefed on your assignment in the conference room

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: See you there.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: I'd like to speak to Edna, please.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: E? This is Helen.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Helen Parr? You know...Elastigirl?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Yes, yes, yes. It's been a while. Listen, there's only one person Bob would trust to patch his supersuit and that's you, E.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Look, I'm calling about...

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Beg? Uh, no. I'm calling about suit. Ab-about Bob's suit! I'm calling about Bob's suit!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: It's bigger! It's badder! Ladies and gentlemen, it's too much for Mr. lncredible! Whoa! Whoa! It's finally ready. You know, I went through quite a few supers to get it worthy to fight you, but man, it wasn't good enough! After you trashed the last one, I had to make some major modifications. Sure it was difficult, but you are worth it. I mean, after all...I am your biggest fan.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: My name is not Buddy! And it's not lncrediBoy either! That ship has sailed. All I wanted was to help you. I only wanted to help! And what did you say to me?

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: It tore me apart. But I learned an important lesson. You can't count on anyone. Especially your heroes.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: See? Now you respect me, because I'm a threat. That's the way it works. Turns out there's a lot of people, whole countries who want respect. And they will pay through the nose to get it. How do you think I got rich? I invented weapons. And now I have a weapon only I can defeat. And when I unleash it, I'll get--

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: [laughing] You sly dog! You got me monologuing. I can't believe it. It's cool, huh? Zero-point energy. I save the best inventions for myself. Am I good enough now? Who's super now? I'm Syndrome! Your nemesis and...

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Oh, brilliant!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: All right, try this one on for size, big boy.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: E, I just...

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: E, It's great to see you, but I gotta tell you I have no idea what you're talking about. I just...

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Thanks.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Started?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: What on earth do you think the baby will be doing?!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Jack-Jack doesn't have any powers.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: What do I think? Bob is retired! I'm retired! Our family is underground. You helped my husband resume secret hero work behind my back?!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: He wouldn't. Didn't. Doesn't.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: What are you saying?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Of course.

Speaker: guard 1
Dialogue: Hey, hey. We got a man down!

Speaker: guard 2
Dialogue: Come on, let's go.

Speaker: guard 2
Dialogue: Are you okay? What happened?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Oh, hello. This is Helen Parr. Bob Parr is my husband. I was wondering if you could give me the number of the hotel he's staying at? The number I have is no good.

Speaker: woman
Dialogue: Mr. Parr no longer works at Insuricare.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: What do you mean? He's on a business trip. A company retreat.

Speaker: woman
Dialogue: My records say his employment was terminated almost two months ago.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: [sobbing] I am such an idiot. I let this happen, you know. The new sports car, the getting in shape, the blond hair, the lies.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Now I'm losing him! What'll I do? What'll I do?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Hmm?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: There's lots of leftovers that you can reheat. Make sure Dash does his homework. And both of you, get to bed on time. I should be back tonight. Late. You can be in charge that long, can't you?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Yeah. But why am I in charge again?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Nothing. Just a little trouble with Daddy.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You mean Dad's in trouble, or Dad is the trouble?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: I mean either he's in trouble, or he's going to be.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey! What's that? Where'd you get that, Mom? You made a cool outfit? Hey, are those for us? We all get cool outfits?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Ha-ha!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Dash! You come back here this moment!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Hey, Snug. Thanks for getting back. I know this is short notice, but I was hoping that I could get you to...

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What are these?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Look, I'm The Dash! The Dash likes.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Just a second. Take that off before somebody sees it.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: But you're packing one just like it. Are you hiding something?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Oh, please, honey. I'm on the phone...Dash!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Yikes! This is yours. It's specially made.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What's going on?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: You're not coming! And I've gotta pack!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What makes you think it's special?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: I don't know. Why'd Mom try to hide it?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Snug, I'm calling in a solid you owe me.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: A jet. What do you got that's fast?

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Island approach. India Golf niner-niner checking in. VFR on top. Over.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Island tower, this is India Golf niner-niner requesting vectors to the initial. Over.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Easy, Helen. Easy. Easy, girl. You're overreacting. Everything's fine. They're just all getting coffee. At the same time. Yeah.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: You sir, truly are ''Mr. lncredible''! You know, I was right to idolize you. I always knew you were tough, but tricking the probe by hiding under the bones of another super? Oh, man! I'm still geeking out about it! [sighs] And then you had to just go and ruin the ride. I mean, Mr. lncredible calling for help? [mocking] ''Help me, help me.'' Lame, lame, lame, lame, lame! All right, who did you contact?!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: I am referring to last night at 2307 hours while you were snooping around. You sent out a homing signal.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: And now a government plane is requesting permission to land here! Who did you contact?!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Play the transmission.

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: India golf niner-niner checking in. VFR on top. Over.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: So you do know these people. Well, then, I'll send them a little greeting.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Ow!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: It's not my fault! Dash ran away, and I knew I'd get blamed for it--

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: That's not true!

Speaker: kari
Dialogue: You don't have to worry about one single thing, Mrs. Parr. I've got this baby-sitting thing wired. I've taken courses and learned CPR and I got excellent marks and certificates...

Speaker: kari
Dialogue: I also brought Mozart to play while he sleeps to make him smarter because leading experts say Mozart makes babies smarter.

Speaker: kari
Dialogue: And the beauty part is that the babies don't even have to listen 'cause they're asleep! You know, I wish my parents played Mozart when I slept because half the time I don't even know what the heck anyone's talking about.

Speaker: kari
Dialogue: Oh, there's really no need, Mrs. Parr. I can totally handle anything this baby can dish out. [cooing] Can't I, little baby? I can handle it. Who can handle it?

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Too late! Fifteen years too late.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: But you said we weren't supposed to use our powers.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Mom?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I've never done one that big!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: We're dead! We're dead!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: It blew up!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: We survived but we're dead!

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: We have a confirmed hit. Target was destroyed.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Ah, you'll get over it. I seem to recall you prefer to ''work alone''. [evil laughter]

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Or what?

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: That sounds a little dark for you. Well, go ahead.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: [laughing] Show me.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: I knew you couldn't do it. Even when you have nothing to lose. You're weak. And I've outgrown you.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: You want to go toward the people that tried to kill us?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Do you expect us to swim there?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Thanks, mom.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: lf you haven't noticed, mom, we're not doing so hot either.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: What?!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You heard her.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: But you said never to use...

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I know what I said! [sighs] Remember the bad guys on those shows you used to watch on Saturday mornings? Well, these guys are not like those guys. They won't exercise restraint because you're children. They will kill you if they get the chance. Do not give them that chance.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mom?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: There's something I...

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: As fast as I can?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mom! Mom, what happened on the plane. I'm sorry. [stammering] I wanted to help. I mean, when you asked me to... I'm sorry.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: He's not weak, you know.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: Valuing life is not weakness.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Oh, hey. Look, look...if you're talking about what happened in the containment unit, I had everything under control.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: And disregarding it is not strength.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: I called his bluff, sweetheart, that's all. I knew he wouldn't have it in him to actually...

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: Next time you gamble, bet your own life!

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Well, not that this isn't fun, but I'm gonna go look around.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What do you think is going on here? You think we're on vacation or something? Mom and Dad's lives could be in jeopardy. Or worse, [whispering] their marriage.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Their marriage? So, the bad guys are trying to wreck Mom and Dad's marriage.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Oh, forget it. You're so immature.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Okay, I'm gonna go look around.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mom said to stay hidden.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: I'm not gonna leave the cave. Sheesh!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: [echoing] Cool!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: [echoing] Cool!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Vi, Vi!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What did you do?

Speaker: guard 1
Dialogue: Huh? What?

Speaker: robot
Dialogue: Identification, please.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey! Hey, Violet! Come here, look.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: It talks!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: There. That one.

Speaker: robot
Dialogue: Voice key incorrect.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: ''Voice key''?

Speaker: robot
Dialogue: Voice key incorrect.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Wait a second...

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: What do we do?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Run!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Where are we going?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Away from here!

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: There isn't much time.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: [choking] Please...

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: [choking] Family survived the crash. They're here on the island!

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: [gasping, coughing]

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: Hello. You must be Mrs. Incre--

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: They might've triggered the alert.

Speaker: mirage
Dialogue: Security's been sent into the jungle. You better get going.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Think they're supers?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Dash, remember what Mom said.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: guard 2
Dialogue: Hey! Stop talking!

Speaker: guard 3
Dialogue: Hold it! Freeze!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Dash, run!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Run!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Oh yeah!

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: What the--?! They're supers!

Speaker: guard 2
Dialogue: Get the boy! Show yourself!

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Ha, ha!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: I'm alive. Yeah!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Uh-oh.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: I know you're there, Little Miss Disappear.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: You can't hide from me.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: There you are.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Don't touch my sister!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: How are you doing that?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I don't know!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Whatever you do, don't stop!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mom! Dad! Hey!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: We were so worried about you.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Wow.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Whoa.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey, time out! What have we here? Matching uniforms? Oh, no! Elastigirl? [laughs] You married Elastigirl? Whoa! And got busy! It's a whole family of supers! Looks like I've hit the jackpot! Oh, this is just too good!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Huh? Huh? Oh, come on! You gotta admit, this is cool. Just like a movie! The robot will emerge dramatically, do some damage. Throngs of screaming people! And just when all hope is lost, Syndrome will save the day! I'll be a bigger hero than you ever were!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Oh, I'm real. Real enough to defeat you! And I did it without your precious gifts, your oh-so-special powers. I'll give them heroics. I'll give them the most spectacular heroics anyone's ever seen! And when I'm old and I've had my fun, I'll sell my inventions so that everyone can be superheroes. Everyone can be super. And when everyone's super...no one will be. [evil laughter]

Speaker: soldier
Dialogue: Fire at will!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Um..dad?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Well, I think Dad has made some excellent progress today but I think it's time we wind down now.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Hey, look. Hey! Every time they run, you take a shot.

Speaker: guard 2
Dialogue: Yeah, okay.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey, how about a rocket?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You don't have to. Use the coordinates from the last launch.

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: I, uh...put it away.

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: Why do you need to know?

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: Uh-uh! Don't you think about running off doing no derrin'-do! We've been planning this dinner for two months!

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: My evening's in danger!

Speaker: honey
Dialogue: ''Greater good''? I am your wife! I'm the greatest good you are ever gonna get!

Speaker: man
Dialogue: Run!

Speaker: woman
Dialogue: My baby!

Speaker: man
Dialogue: The supers have returned!

Speaker: woman
Dialogue: Is that Fironic?

Speaker: man
Dialogue: Fironic?

Speaker: woman
Dialogue: No, Fironic has a different outfit.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: No, no, I'm a new superhero! I'm Syndrome!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: All right, stand back.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Someone needs to teach this hunk of metal a few manners.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Ha, ha!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Are we there yet?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Super-duper, Dad!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: [laughing] Let's do that again.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Violet?

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Dad!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I'm okay, mom. Really.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: The remote controls the robot!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey, dad! Throw it, throw it!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Got it!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mom, I've got it! I've got the remote!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: It's coming back!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: That wasn't right.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Give me that!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: It's getting closer!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: It doesn't work!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: It's getting closer!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: We're not going anywhere!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Huh? No!

Speaker: old man
Dialogue: Hey, did you see that? Eh? That's the way to do it. That's old school.

Speaker: rick
Dialogue: We've frozen all of Syndrome's assets. lf he even sneezes, we'll be there with a hanky and a pair of handcuffs. The people of this country are indebted to you.

Speaker: rick
Dialogue: Let the politicians figure that one out. But I've been asked to assure you we'll take care of everything else. You did good, Bob.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: [stammering] Yeah, I just... yeah.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Thanks, Dad.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: That was so cool when you threw that car!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Hey, mom! That was sweet when you snagged that bad guy with your arm and kinda whiplashed him into the other guy. It was so sweet!

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: ...aced those guys that tried to kill us! That was the best vacation ever! I love our family.

Speaker: rick
Dialogue: Here we are.

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Shh. The baby is sleeping. You took away my future. I'm simply returning the favor. Oh, don't worry, I'll be a good mentor. Supportive, encouraging. Everything you weren't. And in time, who knows, he might make a good sidekick. Ha ha!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: This isn't the end of it! I will get your son, eventually. I'll get your son!

Speaker: syndrome
Dialogue: Oh, no.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: Does this mean we have to move again?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Do we have to have cheerleaders at the track meet? I mean, what is that all about?

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Well, I always thought it was more like a...

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: Hey.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Hey.

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: You're, uh, Violet, right?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: That's me.

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: See you, Vi.

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: You look different.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I feel different. Is different okay?

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: Hey, different is...[clears throat] Different is great. [stammering] Would you wanna...

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: Do you think maybe...[stammering]...you and I...you know...

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: Do you...

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Shh. I like movies. I'll buy the popcorn. Okay?

Speaker: tony
Dialogue: [stammering] A movie. There you go. Yeah...yeah! Wait, wait...so Friday?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Friday.

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Come on, run! Pick up the pace! Move it, move it! Pace it! Slow down just a little bit! Don't give up! Make it close!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Second!

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: Close second, close second. Yeah!

Speaker: bob
Dialogue: That's my boy!

Speaker: helen
Dialogue: Dash, I'm so proud of you.

Speaker: dash
Dialogue: I didn't know what the heck you wanted me to do.

Speaker: underminer
Dialogue: Behold the Underminer! I am always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon all will tremble before me!
